snippet.title: Deadfall Tropics Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming May. Deadfall Tropics is an extremely difficult, narrative based action platformer set on a deadly tropical island in the early 40's. Find treasure to unlock alternate endings and a new game mode. Try not to throw your controller against a wall. 
Buy here
https://store.steampowered.com/app/842770
Follow on Twitter
https://twitter.com/DeadfallTropics
And Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/deadfalltropics/
Indie db
http://www.indiedb.com/games/deadfall-tropics
